amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to providing mortgage lending to rural areas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 339 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 339 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Rounds.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 339 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
